title: After the Plague
description: 100 years after a man-made plague has destroyed the earth, the great-grandson of the original survivors sets out to find his great-grandmother's diary. Daniel has never been outside his community and what he finds on his journey alarms him. When he comes across a society ruled solely by women, where men are emasculated, everything he believes in is challenged. Which society is right? Which is better? Which is more humane? Choice is a difficult thing...
author: Jean Ure
